Package com.spleefleague.core.chat

Class ChatGroup

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.spleefleague.core.chat.ChatGroup
  • public class ChatGroup
extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      ChatGroup​(java.lang.String chatTag)  

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods Deprecated Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void addPlayer​(CorePlayer cp)
      Adds a player to the ChatGroup and updates their scoreboard to match the default version (no personal scores filled)
      void addTeam​(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String displayName)
      Adds a line at the bottom of the scoreboard, name is used to refer to the team but is converted to an unreadable string of ChatColors to prevent it from showing up on the board
      void removePlayer​(CorePlayer cp)
      Removes a player from the ChatGroup and resets their SideBar scoreboard
      void removeTeam​(java.lang.String name)  
      void sendMessage​(java.lang.String msg)
      Sends a chat message to all players in the ChatGroup
      void sendTitle​(java.lang.String title, java.lang.String subtitle, int fadeIn, int stay, int fadeOut)
      Sends a title to all players in the ChatGroup
      void setExperience​(float progress, int level)
      Sets the experience level and progress of every player in the ChatGroup
      void setRightSideBuffer​(int buffer)
      Sets the number of pixels to the right second text is shown
      void setScoreboardName​(java.lang.String name)
      Sets the name displayed at the top of the scoreboard
      void setTeamDisplayName​(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String displayName)
      Sets the displayed name of a team, sent to all players in the ChatGroup
      void setTeamDisplayName​(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String displayLeft, java.lang.String displayRight)
      Sets the displayed name of a team, sent to all players in the ChatGroup
      void setTeamDisplayNamePersonal​(DBPlayer dbp, java.lang.String name, java.lang.String displayName)
      Does not store name locally, only sent to specified player
      void setTeamScore​(java.lang.String name, int score)
      Deprecated. 

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • setRightSideBuffer

        public void setRightSideBuffer​(int buffer)
        Sets the number of pixels to the right second text is shown
        Parameters:
        buffer - Pixel Count

      • addTeam

        public void addTeam​(java.lang.String name,
                    java.lang.String displayName)
        Adds a line at the bottom of the scoreboard, name is used to refer to the team but is converted to an unreadable string of ChatColors to prevent it from showing up on the board
        Parameters:
        name - Name
        displayName - Display Name

      • removeTeam

        Sets the displayed name of a team, sent to all players in the ChatGroup
        Parameters:

        displayName - Display Name

      • setTeamDisplayName

        public void setTeamDisplayName​(java.lang.String name,
                               java.lang.String displayLeft,
                               java.lang.String displayRight)
        Sets the displayed name of a team, sent to all players in the ChatGroup
        Parameters:
        name - Name
        displayLeft - Shown text on Left
        displayRight - Shown text on Right

      • setTeamDisplayNamePersonal

        public void setTeamDisplayNamePersonal​(DBPlayer dbp,
                                       java.lang.String name,
                                       java.lang.String displayName)
        Does not store name locally, only sent to specified player
        Parameters:
        dbp - DBPlayer
        name - Identifier
        displayName - Display Name

      • setTeamScore

        @Deprecated
public void setTeamScore​(java.lang.String name,
                         int score)
        Deprecated.
        Moving away from using team scores for points, instead use a display name with the score included because scores are used for sorting lines
        Parameters:
        name - Identifier
        score - Score

      • setExperience

        public void setExperience​(float progress,
                          int level)
        Sets the experience level and progress of every player in the ChatGroup
        Parameters:
        progress - Progress 0 to 1
        level - Level
